amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Office of Lead Hazard Control by $35 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restore the funding in the bill for the Residential Lead-Based Paint Hazard Program account in the amount of $35 million (by transfer.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 190 (Roll no. 271).
